archimate:Goal.name: To design and Implement a system to enable easy storage and retrieval of standard responses to auditor, bid and sales case questions related to Security and Compliance
archimate:Goal.documentation: Set of standard Q & A repository which will enable standard answers to bid, presales and audit questions. The current thinking is to utilize what we already have in Tietoevry Connect to build the repository, instead of looking at implementing new technology. The repository could probably be built in Sharepoint Lists, but some analysis is needed to make a final decision.
